'''Nadja Anderberg''' is a Content Manager<ref>https://www.linkedin.com/in/nadjaanderberg/</ref><ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]] since August 2024. She works with reviewing community-made maps to be published as part of the [[Java Realms Content Creator Program]].

She is also a [https://twitch.tv/violinetries Twitch streamer] and has participated in multiple hardcore SMP servers, most notably Challengers SMP and HomeSMP.
